PROBABLE CAUSE AFFIDAVIT
1 Arrest 3 Request for Warrant 2 Juvenile
2 NTA 4 Request for Capias
Agency ORI Number Agency Name Agency Report Number
R , 0 5 0 0 6 0 0 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 7 6 5 1 0 0 1 2 6 3 1 0 2 7
Charge Type  1. Felony  Misdemeanor  5. Ordinance
Check if many  2. Traffic Felony  4. Traffic Misdemeanor  6. Other
05-2009
Charge Description Charge Description Charge Description
Possession of MARYJANA
Charge Description
Possession of Drug Paraphernalia
Victim's Name (Last, First, Middle)
Local Address (Street, Apt. Number) (City) (State) (Zip) Phone
Business Address (Name, Street) (City) (State) (Zip) Phone
The undersigned certifies and swears that he/she has just and reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe that the above named Defendant committed the following violation of law.
The Person taken into custody was observed by
Committed the below acts in my presence. that he/she saw the arrested person commit the below acts.
confessed to was found to have committed the below acts, resulting from my (described) investigation.
admitting to the below facts.
On the 11 day of SEPTEMBER 2005 at 1149 A.M. P.M. (Specifically include facts constituting cause for arrest.)
on SUNDAY, SEPTEMBER 11, 2005 AT APPROXIMATELY 2336 HOURS, I OBSERVED A FOUR DOOR WHITE MITSUBISHI, FL TAG #CJ07JY, PARKED IN A SAFETY ZONE WITHIN A CURVE IN THE ROADWAY, ACROSS FROM 760 NORTH OCEAN BLVD. AS I DROVE UP BEHIND THE VEHICLE, THE VEHICLE LEFT THE SAFETY ZONE WHICH I THEN CONDUCTED A CAR STOP ON THE 200 BLOCK OF BAHAMA LANE. UPON APPROACHING THE AUTO, I OBSERVED FIVE OCCUPANTS INSIDE THE CAR, SEVERAL HAVING BLOODSHOT EYES. I ALSO DETECTED AN ODOR OF MARYJANA FROM INSIDE THE AUTO ALONG WITH OBSERVING THE OCCUPANTS APPEARING TO BE NERVOUS, I SPOKE WITH THE OCCUPANTS OF THE VEHICLE AND ASKED THEM IF THEY HAD MARYJANA, THE DEFENDANT informed me that SHE DID. HANDING ME A CLEAR PLASTIC BAG CONTAINING MARYJANA, A BROWN PAPER BAG CONTAINING MARYJANA AND A GLASS PIPE CONTAINING MARYJANA RESIDUE. BOTH THE MARYJANA AND PARAPHERNALIA TESTED POSITIVE.
Based on the aforementioned incident, I arrested and charged WITH POSSESSION OF MARYJANA, FSS 893.13(6)(8) AND Possession of Drug Paraphernalia, FSS 893.147.
MARIJUANA WEIGHED AT 3.0 6(GRAMS)
SWORN AND SUBSCRIBED BEFORE ME
Sat W Burdick
NOTARY/PUBLIC/CLERK OF COURT/POLICE OFFICER
9-12-05
DATE
DISTRIBUTION: WHITE - Court Copy GREEN - State Attorney YELLOW - Agency PINK - Agency
07/26/17 Page 76 of 95 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031073

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten text and has some redacted information. The document is a probable cause affidavit related to a drug possession case.
